title: Profile
tips: Change your password, e-mail address or name
needToSetPassword: You need to set a password.
newPasswordExpiredPriviledge: Your session is too old to set a password. You need to log out and recover your account by clicking on the "Forgot your password?" link on the Log In page.
noTokens: You haven't created any token yet. Make one by clicking 'Add' on the top right.
newTokenTips: Here is your newly created token, make sure to copy it now. You won't be able to see it again!
